title: Lake Chelan National Recreation Area: Links and Resources
body: Links and Resources       Publications Climate Action Plan, North Cascades Climate Change Brochure, Pacific West Region Climate Friendly Parks Accomplishments, North Cascades, 2009-2010    Web Resources: North Cascades Glacier Monitoring Program http://www.nps.gov/noca/naturescience/glacial-mass-balance1.htm  NPS Climate Change Web Portal www.nps.gov/climate change  Climate Friendly Parks http://www.nps.gov/climatefriendlyparks/  Climate Change Wildlife and Wildlands Toolkit http://www.globalchange.gov/resources/educators/toolkit  Climate Impacts Group http://cses.washington.edu/cig/  National Park Foundation Electronic Field Trip http://northcascadeseft.org/  EPA Climate Change www.epa.gov/climatechange  Facing Climate Change (multimedia) http://bdsjs.com/facing-climate-change/  Cascading Effects (multimedia) http://www.nps.gov/noca/photosmultimedia/video.htm
